post.author: S. Suh Lee
post.content:
Hi, all

I checked in some more scripts for watir testing. Now all cases described in the Test Plan document are covered.

I am planning to make a simple procedure to run these scripts soon.  

Also, there are some changes for some jsp files under Coska_MySchool project. I added/changed some of the ids for a few buttons, tables etc. Please synchronize your files before you work on them.

Thanks,
post.title: myschool_watir scripts checked in
